card_HTML:
I am a passionate young developer, who is constantly building new things and experimenting with new programming languages and technologies.

I mainly program with web technologies such as JavaScript (client-side and Node.js), PHP, and of course HTML & CSS. I'm focused on simply building something beautiful with code as a hobby, and learning new technologies to help achieve that. I've built hundreds of websites and programs, most of which are open-sourced!

This site includes websites and programs I've built and written, an extended about page, and lastly, my blog, where I speak about code and being a developer. You can also continue scrolling here on the homepage to see the latest by me!
